alert.note: Alert for Clay; Cloud; Dickinson; Ottawa; Republic; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 1:56AM CDT until April 20 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Dickinson County in central Kansas... Ottawa County in north central Kansas... Republic County in north central Kansas... Clay County in north central Kansas... Washington County in north central Kansas... Cloud County in north central Kansas... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 155 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Clyde to 4 miles west of Talmage, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 65 mph winds and quarter size hail in Glasco. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Concordia, Clay Center, Minneapolis, Belleville, Washington, Wakefield, Clyde, Bennington, Clifton, Miltonvale, Glasco, Linn, Scandia, Delphos, Greenleaf, Tescott, Jamestown, Morganville, Cuba and Morrowville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Cloud; Dickinson; Ottawa; Republic; Washington
